title: Shiang Hai Vegetarian's - maybe closed
description: Buffet at RM17.00 adult and RM10.00 children 2-12 years old. Steam boat 5.30-10pm at adult RM15.00. Some alarka mee and rice. No MSG. Chinese name: 香海日式素食坊. 自助火锅，备有东炎汤和糙米汤底，标榜无味精。 NOTE: maybe closed/shut down, please verify and let HappyCow know.
streetAddress: 27, Jln. 6/62D, Medan Putra Business Centre, Bandar Sri Menjalara
